welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rijswijk, the charming city known for its picturesque streets and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Rijswijk has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves European and intercontinental flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to flights for SkyTeam alliance members.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is mainly used for budget airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by KLM and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
